dmca.title: [EV1-C2076360W] entblog.net
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.ev1servers.net/About/dmca.aspx

Legal Response Team

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@ev1servers.net [mailto:abuse@ev1servers.net] 
Sent: Friday, December 08, 2006 9:11 AM
To: DMCA
Subject: [EV1-C2076360W] entblog.net

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. entblog.net
Added by system at Friday, Dec 8 2006 08:26 am
X-MailFrom: lambic@lambic.co.uk
X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net
Received: from [70.87.6.111] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for
<abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net>; Fri Dec 8 08:26:42 2006
Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by
smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830);
  Fri, 8 Dec 2006 08:26:01 -0600
Return-path: <lambic@lambic.co.uk>
Delivery-date: Fri, 08 Dec 2006 08:26:01 -0600
Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180]
helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com)  by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from
lambic@lambic.co.uk)  with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256)
 (Exim)
 id 1Gsgfo-0001Yl-N1
 for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 08 Dec 2006 08:26:01 -0600
Received: from relais.videotron.ca ([24.201.245.36])  by
mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from lambic@lambic.co.uk)  with
esmtp (Exim) 
        id 1Gsgfk-000B3Q-0d 
        for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 08 Dec 2006 08:25:56 -0600
Received: from belch.dummy.ca ([24.202.252.234]) by
VL-MO-MR003.ip.videotron.ca  (Sun Java System Messaging Server 6.2-2.05
(built Apr 28 2005))  with ESMTP id
<0J9Y0016ULF5SDF0@VL-MO-MR003.ip.videotron.ca> for  abuse@theplanet.com;
Fri, 08 Dec 2006 09:25:53 -0500 (EST) 
Received: by belch.dummy.ca (Postfix, from userid 500)        id 65C207F8E;
Fri, 
 08 Dec 2006 11:11:56 -0500 (EST)
Date: Fri, 08 Dec 2006 11:11:56 -0500
From: Mark Styles <abuse@lambic.co.uk>
Subject: entblog.net
To: abuse@theplanet.com
Message-id: <20061208161156.GB26195@lambic.co.uk>
MIME-version: 1.0
Content-type: multipart/signed; micalg=pgp-sha1;
protocol="application/pgp-signature"; boundary=zx4FCpZtqtKETZ7O
Content-disposition: inline
User-Agent: Mutt/1.4i
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 08 Dec 2006 14:26:01.0155 (UTC)
FILETIME=[C9090930:01C71AD4] 

 (multipart/signed)
MIME element (text/plain)
One of your clients, using domains istblog.net and entblog.net, are
scraping content from many different blogs to create content for their
own fake blog. This is obviously copyright violation. 
 
An example of this abuse: 
 
http://entblog.net/blogs/california-auto-accident-attorney/19275/ 
 
is taking content from this blog post: 
 
http://www.lambic.co.uk/blog/archives/2006/11/giving-away-free-stuff/ 
 
There is no contact information on either entblog.net or istblog.net so
I have no choice but to go upstream to their service provider. 
 
--
Mark Styles
http://www.lambic.co.uk 
 
 
MIME element (application/pgp-signature) MIME element (text/plain)
